column2: The Empire of [e_spain.GetName] once ruled a vast swathe of [e_iberia.GetName] through a legendary union of two great crowns whose might stretched across all the continents of the world. Now perhaps you will be able to reclaim this most ancient legacy?
You can proclaim yourself emperor of all the Germans, like the Kaisers of Old!
Unify all the German Kingdoms under the new Kaiser!
You can proclaim yourself Emperor in opposition to Brussels!
You can proclaim yourself holy Emperor of the Rhine!
